ygData.subject: Re: MM faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks. I m already KOS in G Faydark, so a major faction hit won t matter. Aeudar
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks. I'm already KOS in G Faydark, so a major faction hit won't matter.

Aeudar

Grant Vanderhule wrote:

> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> method 1: kill bard npcs scattered across antonica. if you are a dark elf,
> ogre, or troll, this isnt much trouble, since you will never be walking past
> a bard guild anyway. possibly problematic for human sk tho.
>
> method 2: kill the REAL princess lenya in highkeep (the one upstairs). this
> results in a HUGE faction increase with MM, but also a HUGE faction decrease
> in gfay. so watch your step ;)
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
